language.response: ✅ The language of the bot is now set to `English` 🇬🇧.

setup.done:
`🤖 **WhosThat** is now setup to send messages in <#${whosThatChannel.id}>.

> <#${pickerChannel.id}> will let you pick between 10 messages everyday.
> Make sure to select the best message to send!`

sender.error:
`❌ An error occured while sending the message. Check that the bot is setup correctly.

> Don't forget to setup </users:${config.default.SLASH_COMMANDS_IDS.users}>`
